page.title: 20PETS - HOBBIES IN COUSLAND
page.content: IN A SURVEY OF 35 CHILDREN IN OUR VILLAGE SCHOOL, WE FOUND OUT THESE FACTS. THE MOST POPULAR PETS WERE DOGS AND CATS - 23 DOGS AND 20 CATS. TROPICAL FISH WERE OWNED BY 9 PEOPLE, HAMSTERS, HORSES AND RABBITS BY 2 PEOPLE. OTHERS HAD HENS, OR A PHEASANT. TWO PEOPLE HAD THREE PETS, BUT 7 PEOPLE HAD NO PETS. THE MOST POPULAR HOBBIES WERE RIDING, FOOTBALL AND SWIMMING. OTHER PEOPLE LIKED COMPUTERS, FISHING, CYCLING, READING OR DRAWING. MOST OF US LIKE TO WATCH TELEVISION IN OUR SPARE TIME. THE FAVOURITE PROGRAMMES ARE A CARTOON CALLED "DOGTANION" BASED ON THE STORY "THE THREE MUSKETEERS", AN AMERICAN SERIES CALLED "STREET HAWK", ABOUT A SECRET MOTOR-CYCLE DETECTIVE. ALL KINDS OF CARTOONS WERE POPULAR WITH EVERYONE.
